Thinking back to this one time when my inquisitive nature got the best of me, it sent my dear mother to spend several weeks in a rest home.

Charlie, he was my very best friend, and I, we went to visit old Miss Smyth. Now she was an old lady and for the most part quite nice. She would welcome young people when they might come to visit, offering refreshments and wanting to talk. Being she lived alone on her centennial farm I suspect, she was lonely and longed for conversation. If one did come for a visit, she would expect her visitors to remain on the front porch, never allowing anyone to go inside her spacious old home. Yet boys being boys we were ready to seek adventure, and so on one day we got ourselves into trouble.

Visiting the nice ole’ lady and accepting her refreshments we waited, watching until she with conversing tired her out, and drifted off to sleep while sitting in a rocking chair. Charlie looked to me and we both smiled, then quietly the two of us entered the old house.

Sneaking around and trying our best to be quiet, Charlie stumbled tripping over the corner of an area rug. 111222111222112.content:
Jessica kept smiling as she watched John obey her commands and slip on the ring. The ruby gem on the silver glowed though John didn’t seem to notice. However, Jessica saw that his eyes had taken on a slight shade of red.

“Now, why don’t you try on the necklace?”

John obeyed without question this time. Jessica’s beautiful pearl necklace hung widely around John’s neck like a hangman’s noose. For just a moment, the white of the pearl took on a sinister red hue before returning to their normal state. Looking into John’s eyes, Jessica smirked. They had become even redder and were now starting to look like the ruby on the ring.

“Now the earrings,” she commanded with a more confident voice.

“But, Jessica,” he spoke as if in a trance. “I don’t have earring holes.”

She huffed as if the questioned annoyed her. “Well, make some!”

“Yes, Jessica.”

Jessica had spoken rashly without thinking of the consequences to John’s supposed hypnotism into a chubby companion. At first, she thought he was going to grab the first sharpest thing he could find and stab himself in the earlobe. Instead, John did nothing but sit there for a moment. At first, Jessica had thought nothing had happened until she looked close at his ears. Starting as tiny pin pricks, two black voids began to grow where earrings would normally be. When they were large enough, John grabbed the earrings and fit them perfectly into place.

“H-How did you do that?”

“Do what, Jessica?”

“Your ears…!”

“Are they too big?” asked John. “Do you want them to be changed?”

The realization dawned on Jessica as to what the old woman had given her. While the clothes were making John bigger and more like someone her own size, the jewelry was giving her the proper to add the fine details. Or, at least, that was her theory. She decided to test it.

“No, John,” she spoke. “But I would like it better if you had red hair.”

Again, John halted in place as Jessica watched his normal brunette locks burn away into a vibrant shade of scarlet. It was like watching wildfire consume a forest, which trailed all the way down to the tips of John’s new hair dangling in the middle of his back.

While the color changed in his hair, the clothes were doing more work to his face. His features softened, his sharp protruding chin retreated slightly to make way for the beginnings of a double chin. His bulbous snout flattened into a cute button nose. And the puffiness of his lips increased ever so slightly.

“I’m feeling pretty full,” John said as he patted his bigger belly. He continued to have a mind of his own whenever Jessica wasn’t giving him orders. She wasn’t sure how he was going to react once he noticed his changes though.

“John,” she began. “From now on, anything you notice that is different about yourself is normal.”

“Of course, Jessica.”

An evil feeling of glee overcame Jessica and her new toy. Though a big part of her told her that what she was doing was wrong to John, but that was silenced with a hungering curiosity and desire. The old woman was right, this was what she had wanted. And for the first time in a long while, Jessica felt happy and not alone.

The question remained as to how much influence she had over John. Would he become completely female the longer he wore the clothes? And what would the final outcome be? Could she shape him into her exact image of the ideal bestie? There was only one way to find out and Jessica twisting around in her seat with excitement as she prepared to speak her next commands to John.

“John…”

As the time pass, you are going to take all the traits of Mrs. Roosie, size and all. Everytime you AND Mrs Roosie will eat, all the fat will be transfer to you.
After a few bites the slice is finished.

Mrs. Roosie smiles radiantly:"Thanks for your help Eric, you know if you want you can finish the cake"

You instantaneously bring more cakes to your mouth, as you devour the rest of it, under the obliging look of Mrs. Roosie

As you wash your mouth with a bottle of orange juice you look Mrs. Roosie:"Thank you Madame. But I need to go now"

"Don't worry Eric, comes anytime"

You return to your apartment and play videogames till late night after, binging with all you find in the fridge, while Mrs Roosie herself eat two copious meals.

You feel bloated like you never have as you've already gain 7 pounds (equally distributed between your ass and your belly).
11122221.title: Take it.

choices: You wake up in your room.
You wake up in another room.
111222212.content:
After a week you've gained nearly 30 lbs, but you've even lost 10 pounds of muscle, leaving you at 200 lbs. You're thinking about the gain weight but you scoff at it. You just need to do a little exercise to lose it.

But for this full week you have stayed at home for the time being, watching tv and playing videogames.
Since you've finished all your money, and it's pay day, you go to Mrs. Roosie hoping in an extension of the terms.

"Don't worry Eric I know we can find an agreement. How about this, you'll work for me. I need to clean some rooms, sweep the gardens, you know, the usual. In exchange I'll cook for you" Mrs Roosie says nodding.

"I don't know Mrs Roosie, I don't want to take advantage of the situation". you say blushing.

"No problem Eric. I can cook double you know, it's no biggie" she says smiling "I didn't thought you cared about an old lady problems"

"Well, Mrs Roosie, you're not an old lady, you're my landlady, and you've always been good to me. I think you were polite when you didn't need to be. Even this offer is quiet a deal. Really I don't want to exploit your kind hospitality" you say smiling lightly

Mrs Roosie seems surprised by your words. She looks at you speechless:"Hmm Eric, can you wait here a second? Help yourself with the cake on the table if you wish" she says leaving with another fudge mountain cake to eat.

You sit on the sofa, looking the cake. It's better if you avoid all these calories. But the smell is too attractive to deny. You cut yourself a slice and start eating it. Again after a few seconds, you get up and take the entire cake bringing it with you and eating it while you watch tv. After a few minutes you fall asleep.
111222212.title: You're out of money

choices: After the work, you have lunch with Mrs Roosie
1112222122.content:
As you wake up, you find yourself in a queen-sized bed, very soft and comfortable.

"Hold on, where the hell am I?" you say looking around. You're in a big room, with white walls and few furniture, as it's a fresh new room.

Mrs. Roosie reach the door:"Hello Eric, I'm sorry. I have moved you because I thought you would be more comfortable here"

You nod, looking around:"Whose this room is? It seems it's never been used"

Mrs. Roosie looks a bit sad:"I know right? It's for my daughter, but she didn't live here"

"You have a daughter? I didn't know, I'm sorry. Will she comes soon?"

Mrs Roosie smiles slightly as she looks at you:"I still don't know. May be soon that I think. I've got an idea, why don't you use it for the time being?"

"I don't think I should, you've already been to kind with me"

"I insist" she says "You can also give me a hand while I arrange it, what do you say?"

You look around:"Ok, ok...I accept" you nod "When do I start work?"

"What about now? What do you think about the colors of the walls?"

"The walls? It's for your daughter right? What's her age? Why not pink or purple?"

"She's about your age more or less" she says with a bit of sadness in her eyes "Well I think it would be pink. I have some tins in the garage. Why don't you pick them up and start painting"

You smile:"Right away madame".
1112222122.title: You wake up in another room.

11122221221.content:
After the work you're quiet exhausted, but you're happy you did a good job.

"Perfect. She will love it" Mrs Roosie says:"I've cooked just a few things if you're hungry"

As you enter the living rooms you found the table full of hamburgers, fries, pizzas, chickens, pasta

Damn, just a few things? That's the meal for a regiment you think chuckling a little.

"Have a seat" Mrs Roosie says leading you to a chair and fastening a napkin under your neck "help yourself" she says sitting herself in two chairs binded together.

Well, I've sweat a lot. I can eat a few things you think grabbing a pizza.

Mrs Roosie looks at you smiling, before starting eating herself.

As you finish eating you start to feel your clothes a bit tight since you're now 215 pounds and your belly is overflowing your trousers.

"Mind If I go changing my clothes Mrs. Roosie? The food you cooked was so good, and I just couldn't stop eating, I'm sorry" you say blushing.

Mrs Roosie smiles hearty:"No worries. Thank you instead. I know I'm pretty good in the kitchen, but hearing it from you it's comforting. I had an idea, why don't you bring your clothes for the time being? Next month you'll move again upstairs"

You agree, returning to your flat. You change your clothes but they are all a little too tight"Damn, If I'm not stay focus on calories I'll end up like Mrs Roosie" you say. The idea seems not that bad for an instant. But you quickly shock it out of your mind and grab the most baggy tracksuit you found and bring other two and some shirts with you.

"You know?" you say putting the clothes on the wardrobe of the room Mrs Roosie gave to you:"You should put some essence in this room. Your daughter would like that"

Mrs Roosie nods:"You're right. Maybe even a tv?"

"Yes. So she can watch it from the bed, why don't you even take a dvd recorder or a playstation 4 or an xbox?" you say thinking about playing during your month here.

Mrs Roosie laughs:"Yeah, I suppose so"
11122221221.title: After the work, you have lunch with Mrs Roosie

111222212212.content:
After a day of cleaning all the house, Mrs Roosie ask you to go do the shopping for her.
As you enter you found that she have ordered a massive meals at the Mc Donald, with XXXL Fries bags and Coke.

"But what about the shop I did this afternoon?" you say incredulous

"Just put it in the fridge, dear. Today I didn't feel cooking, aside for my usual chocolate cake. I've got something on my mind" she says glum.

"Oh I'm sorry to hear it. Something I can help with?"

Mrs Roosie smiles lightly, as a little tear drop from her eyes:"Just sit near me if you like" she says patting on a chair near her.

You put the food in the fridge and you sit near her. As you eat you try to take her mind off, making jokes and talk about your life, like two old friends.

She is radiant again when she brings the cake on the table and you think that there wouldn't be another better way to cheer up than eating with her, her favorite food.

After the meal, while she's washing the dishes, you sit on of the two big sofa, looking distractedly at the tv, while a soap opera is being played until your eyes close.
111222212212.title: During the evening

choices: Maybe there is another thing I can do.
1112222122121.content:
You open your eyes, smelling a wonderful scent of pancakes. As you turn around in the bed, you look with satisfaction the room who've helped to arrange. You get up, feeling a little weird. You look down and you see you've slept in a white pj with a pink bunny in the middle.

"What? Whose this pj is?" the thing you don't notice is that this week with Mrs Roosie not only made you gain till 230 pounds, but even bring more change to your appearance. You are now 5'6", giving you a more spherical shape. You got man boobs, due to recent gain weight, and you've developed nice love handles near your waist, which it seems a little too much wider for a man. Even your ass seems a little too bulbous for a guy. But it's all well hidden under this new pj.
Even you face seems different, as is now smooth and clean, while your neck is a bit broad and show no sign of your adam's apple. Your hair is longer and straight, and they touch the back of your head.

"Sorry, that's a present from me" says Mrs. Roosie. She's got her usual apron and he's looking you from the door of the room:"Yesterday you fell asleep on the sofa and I didn't know where was your pj, so I gave one I bought long ago. Don't worry it's clean"

"No, no. That's not what I meant" you say feeling awkward. You don't want to jerk with Mrs Roosie, not after she's been so lovely. So you just say:"I think it's kind cute, you know. Thanks by the way".

She smiles giving you her back:"I'm glad to hear it. Why don't you come over. Breakfast is almost ready"

You move a little too fast for your new barycenter, and you stumble on your feet:"Wooa" you say before falling to the ground.

Mrs Roosie come back waddling fast:"Oh my god Eric what's happened?"

"I've tripped. Sorry, my foots must be a little tired this morning" you try to get up, but you feel stab of pain:"ouuuuch"

"What?" says Mrs Roosie:"What's wrong?"

"I think I've hurt my ankle" you say limping a little.

"That's a big problem now. Here, return to your bed. I'm going to bring you the breakfast and then I'll take some bandages"

You limp back to the bed. Here I am. Looked after by the fat lady. What a joke I've become you think.

Mrs Roosie enter with two tray full of pancakes, cakes and orange juice.

"Whoa Mrs Roosie, that's a little too much for me" you say moving your hands in front of you

"Shush now, you're hurt, you need to eat a little more to recover" she says feeding you a pancakes with a fork "That's better" she says nodding:"Now eat the breakfast while I'll first aid you"

As you eat all the food, Mrs Roosie bandages your left foot

"But Mrs Roosie, what am going to do now? I want to help you around the house you know"

"My boy, you're in no shape for doing that" she says feeding you the last morsel of food "Hmmm I've got an offer even if it would sound a little strange for you... since I don't know how to be a mother when my daughter return, what about you call me Mom for the time being? So It wouldn't feel strange when she comes. You don't mind, right?"

You rise an eyebrow:"What's your daughter name anyway, you didn't even tell me last week"

Mrs Roosie looks in your eyes pondering:"Like you. I called her Erica" she says smiling lightly.
1112222122121.title: Next day, more changes.

11122221221211.content:
Really? Well it's no big deal. It's the the two of you here. you think

"Why not. No problem Mrs...." you say "No problem Mum" you correct yourself.

She pinch your cheek smiling:"Thank you Erica, now rest yourself. I don't want you to hurt yourself more. I'll be in the kitchen, cooking for the launch...err do you mind help me for one last time?"

"One last time Mrs....Mum? It's me who should take the blame. You'll always be kind to me"

"Well, I thought that when my daughter arrives, I would got no clothes for her, do you mind buy them online for me? I'll give you my credit card"

"Sure, what she would like?"

"Oh you know, clothes for a girl of your age, some shirts maybe, jeans, skirts, maybe blouses, trousers and cardigans, some dresses?"

"Ok, I'll pick some. What's her size?"

"Hmm...Well she took on from me. So I'm guessing 5X"

That's a big girl for sure. you think Damn, I shouldn't be that hard with Mrs. Roosie daughter. She's my savior, I can't let her down.

"Ok. Don't worry leave it to me"

"Thanks Erica" she says grasping your hands and kissing you on the cheek:"I'll be in the kitchen if you need me. If you feel hungry, I've left some snacks in your drawer"

As Mrs. Roosie leave, you switch the tv on and start playing the playstation. You casually open the drawer, finding it full of twinkies, mars, twix and candy bar.
11122221221211.title: Ok, Mom.

111222212212111.content:
"It's time to start erasing the old Eric, and let my daughter be born" Mrs Roosie says in the kitchen alone, "If I add these petals of loto's flowers to the various food, it should do the trick". The obese witch drop some scales in her cake dough, smiling wickedly.

But all you're hearing are mutters, while you're playing the playstation.

Oh man, I'm so lucky to have found a woman like Mrs Roosie. If I play my cards well, I can stay here a little longer, without paying anything. Too bad she isn't my mother for real, my parents've never let me do anything I wanted.

You stomach grumbles, and you touch your belly without thinking. Feeling the flesh under the pj, catch your attention.

God damn it. Being here got this disadvantage. Eating like big Mrs. Roosie has got is downside. I should really try to eat less if I don't want to catch her you laugh louder than you intend.

"Enjoy yourself my dear?" Mrs Roosie comes in your room, with her usual food cart. You can't not notice her ondulant way of walk, as a little smile appears on your face.

"Yes, thank you....mom" you say remembering your promise "I think my ankle is doing much better. Maybe I can already move outside. I should grab some stuff from my apartment"

Mrs Roosie looks you sulky:"I don't think so. It's better if you rest a little while longer. Here, I've made a special pudding cake. A recipe from my mother, it say it heals even major injuries" she says presenting you the cake on a plate, with a little spoon.

"Well I think I'll avo..mmmmh..." as you open your mouth to talk, the big woman feed you with a bit of the cake. The flavor is a bit strange, like spieces, but the tastes is even more terrific than Mrs Roosie last cakes.

"Wondeeeeerful" you say licking your lips "Can I have a little more?"

Mrs Roosie smiles very widely:"Sure, why don't you play, while I take care of you Erica?

You nod, oddly elated:"Well it's...mmmmmh" you try again to talk, but once again Mrs Roosie push the spoon in your mouth.

"You shouldn't talk while you're eating, my girl" she says grabbing another slice of the cake.

You nod again, even more elated.

As you eat, your mind seems to get enguled by a unnatural fog, like when you're very tired and you head is already on the pillow.
You obediently finish all the pieces of the cake. Even if your first tought was to avoid eating it, you're felling proud of eating it whole now.

"Good, good" Mrs Roosie says cleaning the edge of your mouth with a napkin "Now my dear, what was you saying about the apartment?"

"Apartment...." you try to remember "What apartment?" you make an effort to remember, but you can't put a finger on it.

"Mine perhaps? I've already told you, you can stay here as long as you wish, it's not a big deal for me" Mrs Roosie says, exiting the room with her bottom wobbling around.

Oh man, it would be so good to have an apartment for my own. Lucky for me Mrs Roosie is letting me stay here
111222212212111.title: Later

1112222122121111.content:
After an evening of pizza and film with Mrs Roosie, you've once again slept on the sofa. Only to find the next morning, fully dressed with the white PJ in your queen-size bed. You slighlty open your eyes as the sun enter from your window. Realizing where you're you smile proudly.

Look at this. A king in his room! Mrs Roosie is really kind, she shouldn't "serve" me so much. I should do the hard work, not her. It's not like I'm her daughter....son. When she will be coming home anyway? I didn't even ask her. Let's just hope she'll like her room and the clothes I've bought for her.

You lift the quilt, and roll yourself over the edge of the bed. While you're still sit, you can't fail to notice that the shirt of your PJ has risen some inches over your belly. With a grump you lower it again, pushing the fabric of the shirt. You walk to the mirror, looking at your own reflection.

Man, I've becoming such a blimp. I should really....wait, didn't I said the same yesterday? Why I eat all the food anyway at the end? Because she cooks wonderful you idiot. Damn! I should really avoid it.

Your belly grumbles loudly.

Errr....after breakfast maybe. Let's just eat a thing, than I'm going for a walk. Now let's just change my clothes.

"Ericaaaa, are you awwwwwake? Breakfast is ready, come to kitchen when you wish" you hear Mrs Roosie calls. You notice her cheerful tone.

Is she always so happy for breakfast? Maybe it's because she was for so many years alone.

"Just a moment" you yell back.

You take off your PJ and open the wardrobe. It's full of Erica's cloth but no trace of yours.

"Mrs Roosie, have you seen my clothes?"

"Yes, I'm washing them at the moment, they were all a little dirty. And it's Mum, Erica, we've got a deal don't we? Why don't you pick one of the few you've bought?"

Because these are girl clothes you think cursing.

Well let's just take this pair of black pants and a white t-shirt you think quickly taking the clothes from the closet without even looking at them. They t-shirt fits you well, but you need to actually to pull the ropes of the pants to tighten them at your waist. You're a little worried about your belly which overflow them and bounce over.

You join Mrs Roosie in the kitchen. She's literally jumping around the burner, singing. Her 500 pounds body jiggling around. She have adjusted her hair, curly and put on a red lipstick:"Hello my dear" she says pinching your cheeks "Have a seat. I've just prepared one or two thing" she says giggling. As you look at the table, your jaw drops. It's really full of food. You're surprised it's not breaking under such amount of weight.

Do she increase the amount of food each time we eat together? Jee. Ok Just one thing, the orange juice and I'm out jogging.

You smile:"I'm not feeling so well at the moment, I think I'll just eat the pancakes and go for a walk, I don't want to let the muscle of my ankle get too shabby. And it's better if I don't add more weight."

Mrs Roosie looks grumpy for a moment:"But Erica you were always a little bigger..." she said moving behind you. Then she come again in front of you with a big smile:"All right, eat and go for a walk, I'll wait here if you feel hungry again".

Finally you think eating the pancakes and washing your mouth with the orange juice:"Ok I'm going, I'll be back in..I think 30 mins, than I'll help you with the houseworks"

"Sure" she says smiling back at you.

You don't understand why she's so happy, but you raise your shulders and move outside

Why she said I was always bigger, Mrs Roosie totally forget I was much slimmer back when I move with her.

You start walking around your neighborhood, speeding up your pace after a few moments. Your body feels a bit clumpsy, but you keep going.

Well..it wasn't so bad you're thinking untill two guys get ahed of you and turn to you laughing.

"Nice booty, Tubby!"
"Yeah really JUICY!" they yells

You open your mouth but nothing comes out. Fuck you man, I'm not that fat you think.

Still you turn your face and look to your ass. In horror you realize you took the wrong pants for jog: they got the word JUICY written in capital pink letters over your bottom. You turn full red and go back to Mrs Roosie house the faster way possible. You ring the bell.

Mrs Roosie open the door:"Oh dear, you are sweating so much, take a seat" she says pointing at the chair in the kitchen. You sit down, heavy breathing, as Mrs Roosie pour you a glass of orange juice.

"T-thanks m-mum" you say panting. While you drink your belly grumbles again.

"Hungry my dear? You sure must be after your run. Here, taste this muffins. I've made that with a special recipe" she says as her eyes lit up with joy.

"No, I don...mmmmh" you try to complain, but as soon your mouth is open Mrs Roosie shoves one in it. The spicy flavor hit your brain like a bat hitting a vase.
As you chew in delight, Mrs Roosie brings more muffin to you. Dazed, you finish them all, one by one, under the pleased look of Mrs Roosie.

"I know what you're thinking, I cook too much, that's why I am fat" she says moving the food around the table

You look at her puzzled:" Well...don't say that. You cook really well. You know I'm always be like this. As long I can remember. So it's not the food. I think it's genetics, right?"

She smiles proudly:"That must be it. Why don't you finish all of this now, Erica?" she says squeezing your hand.

You nod, distracted, as you proceed to fill your plate with everything in your sight.
1112222122121111.title: Next day.

11122221221211112.content:
Oh man, I'm one lucky guy. I've found home within my landlady, who serves me like an housekeeper. you chuckles and she even cook like a goddess. My mother always rebuked me because of my weight. Mrs Roosie doesn't even care. Well of course, she got the upper hand here. Ahahah you're thinking while playing the playstation, laying on the bed. You didn't even change yourself: you're still wearing the juicy pants. No one care here in this house.

After the breakfast this morning you passed the time helping Mrs Roosie cleaning all the rooms of the house, and after a massive lunch, you went back to your room to relax while she sit on the sofa watching the tv. You can't understand why she was so happy and joyful when you were eating. Maybe she didn't see anyone with a similiar appetite.

Mrs Roosie open the door and looks at you. Long gone were the day of your 180 pounds frame. You're now verry chubby. Close to 285 pounds. Your belly's got the dimension of a mini exercise ball and your breasts are a little too round to be man boobs, the shape is now very similar to a b-size. Your arms are big, but not for your muscles, but for a lay of fat which sags a bit. The strangest thing is your waist. It's so wide because your bottom is literally bulbous. It's just jut out by a foot and a half. Even your thighs seems a little too curvy for a guy like you, giving you a certain shape of a pear. Even your face is different. Your nose is smaller, but your eyes are a little wider, even your eyebrows are thinner and longer. It's like you're turning into your twin sister, your chubby twin sister.

Mrs Roosie giggles softly:"Soon....very soon"

"What?" you say without even moving your eyes from the tv

Mrs Roosie caughes:"I'm feeling hungry Erica. What do you think? Can we eat soon? I'm going to order some Hamburgers take away?"

"Sure. I mean no problem. I was feeling hungry too"

I know, you're starting to have my same appetite Eric Mrs Roosie thinks Even my same tastes

"Double cheesburger with ketchup and Mayonnaise, right?" she asks

"Woa. Do you read my mind?" you look at her

"Of course, I'm a witch, don't you know? Ahahah" she starts laughing

"Yeah, of course" you roll your eyes and once again turn to the tv "and..."

"XL cherry coke, fried chicken and XXL fries" she finishes for you.

"Well I never tried the cherry coke, but whaterver.."

"Just try. You're going to love it. I know it" she says with a wicked smile.

"I'm going to give you the money for my part"

"Oh no, don't worry Erica. It's on the house. You're going to help me tomorrow with a thing."

"Sure thing Mum" you answer unfocused.
11122221221211112.title: During the evening.

111222212212111122.content:
After the dinner you spent the entire night watching reality shows with Mrs Roosie. You don't like them too much, but you didn't want to disappoint her.

It's now morning and you're already at the table of the kitchen eating Mrs Roosie's pancakes with chocolate cream, while Mrs Roosie, in her usual yellow apron, is still baking cakes for you two to eat.

"You're..really..." nom nom "good at cooking Mum" you say between bits.

"Thank you, Erica...maybe we can cook together sometimes, I can teach you some recipe"

"Why not?" you say "I've always wanted to learn cooking for myself".

"Why don't you try this?" she says putting a lemon cake in front of you "It's fresh baked".

You cut the cake with a fork and bring the piece at your mouth. The aroma hits your nose, than your tongue, than your brain:"Delicious..." ypu say a bit dazzed.

Mrs Roosie walk behind you:"Thank you my dear, please, take another one" she says, but you're already cutting yourself another one without even waiting. She smiles fainlty:"Now, do you remember the favor I was asking you yesterday?"

"Hmm-hmmm" you nod while chewing, as hypnotized.

"There is this friend of mine that have a daughter, Jessica, she is chubby, like us, and must have around your age, maybe one year less. The fact is she don't have many friends and most of the time she just refuse to go out. Do you mind if I invite her here?"

You grab another slice of cake:"No, of course not. It's your house by the way".

"Well, that's not all. I just want her to think you're indeed my daughter, so when she will come here, she will already have a friend"

"B-but...hmm" you swallow the piece of cake. With all our streght you say:"How can I pass for your daughter?"

She chuckles:"Don't worry Erica, you just need the right dress, some jewelry and a bit of make up. There is nothing wrong on dress like a woman sometimes, don't you agree"

As you eat your last piece of cake you nod with a little smile:"There is nothing wrong on dress like a woman sometimes" you repeat mesmerized.

Mrs Roosie smiles widely and claps her hand joyfully:"Thank you, thank you. I know you're gonna be great friends. Now come"

You follow obediently Mrs Roosie to your room. She opens the wardrobe and launches some clothes on the bed. Then she nods.

"Come on Erica, undress". she says in a melodious calm tone of voice.

You remove your pj and your boxer short.

"Cold" you say, but your voice seems different, like a tone higher, you caugh.

Mrs Roosie comes near you:"Here, here. Try this one. I don't want you to catch a cold" she says giving you some clothes. You obediently wear them: a white panty and a white sport bra.

"Perfect. Now this jeans" she says, helping you wear them. They are a bit baggy around your waist "Hmmm it's better if you fasten this around" she says lending you a pink belt.

"Now, just a shirt and a cardigan and we're all done". she says, making you wear a white shirt with tiny flowers and a pink cardigan.

"You know, you kind of remind me when I was younger" she laughs "Now how about some jewelery? Come Erica"

You follow her to her room, Mrs Roosie place her hands around your shoulder and gently shoves you on a stool in front of a dressing table. She opens the drawers.

"I'm thinking, a pearl necklace and pearls earrings...too bad you don't have holes. Don't worry this won't need it" she says securing them at your ears. She then clasps the necklace around your neck. You faintly touch it with your finger.

"You know..." you say still dazzed "It's not so bad as I thought"

"I know, right?" she says nodding proudly:"Lucky for you, you hair is long enough. Let's just put this to arrange them". She brushes your hair and fixes a pink headband on you.

You look at yourself in the mirror Wow! I can really pass for a woman. I'm not even that bad you smile, oddly happy.

Mrs Roosie turn your head:"Now just a bit of mascara, some foundation and a pink lipstick".

"Perfect Erica, you're indeed my daughter now" she says after putting you the make-up.

"Perfect" you repeat dull looking the mirror.

The door bell rings.

"Come on, go open the door".

You stand, walking to the main door. It's a bit strange. Your belly and ass makes you walk in a strange way: you're moving your hips around and wiggle, just like Mrs Roosie.

You open the door without even ask who it is.
111222212212111122.title: Next day.

1112222122121111221.content:
You open the door.

Waiting, in front of you, a girl is smiling. She's quiet large. She must be 5'9" tall, but she must weigh at least 400 pounds. She wears a yellow t-shirt, which seems a little to small for her since her massive breasts makes quiet the valley around them, and a pair of black leggins fixed over her belly, giving her a oddly looking ball resemblance.

Now I understand why she don't leave her house so often. you think rising an eyebrow

She throws her arms around your neck:"You must be Erica!!" she says with joy.

You are catch off-guard by all her weight and you grunt heavily:"H-h-ello Jessica" you manage to say somehow.

She stands, fixing her t-shirt again and starts laughing:"I'm sorry, I'm sorry. I didn't think you were shorter than me"

Wait. I'm really this short? you're thinking, but the fog still engulf your mind

Mrs Roosie catch up with you:"Hello Jessica! You look wonderful my dear, why don't you come inside?"

"Thanks Mrs Roosie" Jessica says going in.

Mrs Roosie leads you to the dining room as you and Jessica sit on the sofa:"Don't worry girls, I'll be in the kitchen baking a snacks, why don't you talk a little in the meanwhile?"

Jessica nods happily and takes your hand:"I'm so happy I can finally meet you. I didn't even know Mrs Roosie got a daughter. She took us a bit off balance. Even my mother didn't know she was married once"

"Yeah well it's a long story" you say awkward

Splendid. What should I say now? Wait, wait, let's just change the subject

"But my mother, never told me about you anyway, are you in highschool? What are your favourite bands?" you say out of the blue.

Jessica smiles, maybe because she never meet someone interested in her life. You both talk for maybe an hour. Life wasn't easy for her, as you know growing up fat has its disadvantages, plus she is a girl so.

"Maybe we can go out together sometimes, eat sometimes around, go shopping?" you say

"I-I don't know. I don't usually..." she says looking at her foot "Do you mind gain a little bit of weight? I don't want to be the fattest girl around" she says blushing.

As if you think laughing.

"Well, maybe I can introduce you some of my friends" you say changing subject once again.

Jessica looks you without speaking.

Earlier you had innocently asked Sybilla if witches could venture out from the coven.
"sure honey" she said "But its dangerous, magic is best and usually you'll need somebody to accompany you"

Now as you lay in a very thin bedrobe, admiring you fat pillowly body. You wondered how to acquire these ingredients.
11131211111222111221112212112121122.title: The document gives out an instruction for you i...

choices: Begin searching for the ingredients with some gassy hijinks
Skip to having all the ingredients and begin making the potion
111312111112221112211122121121211221.content:
You pace back and forth while farting with each step, as you wonder how are you going to acquire that long list of ingredients. That's when an idea sparked your mind as you reach for Greta's note. New words hit the paper before you folded out the paper.

"While usually it's wise to be accompany by a fellow slob witch, it will arose suspicion on what you're up to so, I devised a chant that will temporary enhance your powers to my level so you can find the ingredients with ease. Please utter..."

"Sselb em htiw eht sag fo a neeuq" You utter. You didn't feel any different, til felt a ...PPPPPPPPPPPPPPHHHHHHHHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!!! Explode out your rear. "I never thought I had one like that in me" You giggled as you swept your greasy hair back. The note began to glow again.

"With this temp boost, you should be able to subdue any creature that gives you trouble, makes you immune to any poison and be able to locate any ingredients you are missing. This boost will wear off in a few hours but, once you get doses of the potion, you will feel it's effects again soon. Have fun!"

Knowing the others will wake up in a few hours, you decide to get to it.
111312111112221112211122121121211221.title: Try and boost your magic before sneaking out on...

choices: Revert to human form and take them on
Stay as a hippo and deal with them
1113121111122211122111221211212112211.content:
It was pitch black outside the house, but you quietly creep outside, desperately trying to hold in a fart. As you close the door silently it erupts like a volcano.
PHHHHHHAAAAAARRRPPPPPP!
"Phew" you choke, wafting the gas away before waddling off into the swamp. Everyone else is asleep, so you've quietly snuck on some boots, long travelling robes and a battered ebony broom. The swamp is just as dark and smelly as you remember but you press on. A light spell dancing in your chubby fingers illuminates the twisted trees and scummy water.

You search for around twenty minutes. You had already stolen the nightshade, garlic, blackberries and milk from the ingredients cupboard back in the coven.You soon come around piles of disgusting smelling green mushrooms, sitting atop a rotting tree and filling the air with black spores. Thanks to your temporary magic, the spore only itch faintly as you waddle through the knee deep water and tear some of the toadstools off the decaying bark. They are safely stashed away in your knapsack and you head on.

Your waders slosh through the filthy water as you hum a pop song to yourself. Frogs croak at you from the blackness and bats fly around your head. Your huge body makes you look like a hippo moving through the dirty water, something you yourself find rather amusing.

"SPLOOOSH"

the water has suddenly gotten deeper, now lapping up to your belly button and soaking your robes. "Shit" you hiss, looking ahead the water looks like its only going to get deeper. You have an idea however,

"Natchi fo toua equinne monstroum obsewea" you chant. You feel you belly swelling, your waist expanding. Your huge breasts shrink into your growing stomach while your legs and arms expand with fat and muscle. Your face feels heavy, moments before your nose and mouth elongate and your head becomes rectangular while your long hair shrinks into your heavy skull. The transformation forces you onto all fours, the water supporting your rocketing weight. Your pale skin soon turns a deep shade of pinkish-grey.

The 1,300kg female hippo gives a roar, baring her huge yellow fangs and starts to swim, its huge fat legs kicking up plumes of dirty brown spray. Your belongings are tied in a neat bundle upon your back as you charge through the swamp. Your huge hippo ass is constantly exploding with disgusting vegetable farts, causing the wildlife to flee in your wake. Your enjoying it immensely. The fleeing of power your obese but strong body gives you is mesmerising. You don't even notice a downed swamp tree in your path before you smash straight through, splintering the wood to pieces.

The water soon becomes shallow again and you're trotting like a oversized grey horse. Your oversized head sways from side to side happily, your huge nostrils sucking in the smelly swamp air.

A rock bounces painfully off your head. You turn your mass of blubber around, snorting and farting in anger. More rocks and pebbles bounce off your back and flanks.

Several black figures the size of children are perched on the trees and mudbanks. Some are thin and lanky while others had fat pot-bellies and sagging teats. All have beady red eyes, thin fangs and long curling goat horns. They cackle and screech, throwing more stones and branches at the hippo.

"I take it this are the Imps" you think to yourself, rocks bouncing off your thick hippo hide.
1113121111122211122111221211212112211.title: Begin searching for the ingredients with some g...

11131211111222111221112212112121122111.content:
From a simple wink, you began to shift back into your human form. Already back dressed into your robes you see the cackling imps taunt from afar.

"Laugh while you can" You say as all you can do is smirk.

The imps soon stop to see you slowly levitating out of the water and like a rocket, you let off a massive fart that propels you towards the imps like a bloated bowling ball. The imps had terrible reaction time and couldn't predict your speed and next thing you know, you're sitting on top of them. You hear some high pitch groaning from underneath you, but it soon subside. You get up to see the remains of the imp's lifeless form. Smiling, you to pluck them from the ground like carrots and stored them in your bag.

"Right, off to the next one" You say smiling.
11131211111222111221112212112121122111.title: Revert to human form and take them on

111312111112221112211122121121211221111.content:
Wiping the mud off your ample behind you decide to follow the basilisk. Hopping up on a tree stump, you pull out a small notebook and a bundle. Opening the bundle, you withdraw several rather garlicky sausage rolls and tuck in. While eating you scan that notes you took on the Basilisk, A snake bigger than a man with a thick muscular body that sweated poison and the ability to spit sulphurous flames. The pictures looked rather frightening but you shook it off quickly. Stuffing the last of the smelly meat treats into your gullet, you let out a long quiet fart and pick up the rather battered looking witches broom. You get it under you wide thighs and heavy belly before starting to fly upwards. You start out gently, nearly impaling yourself on several trees but you soon get the hang of it.

Curving away you fly over the miles of thick choking swamps and up the treacherous mountains. Looking down at the mounds of sharp jagged rocks you shudder, remembering what it was like to cross over them. The broom swiftly takes you over the mountains and across endless flat land. Lights from the vast network of roads and motorways stretch as far as you can see. Chuckling at little and wrapping your shawl tight around your shoulders to keep the cold out, you fly onwards following a familiar highway.

For twenty minutes, you watch towns, villages and railway lines pass beneath you. Planes fly in the pitch black sky, but your speed surpasses them easily. Gradually the grassland and wood turns to dry scrub and rocky hills. The towns become less frequent and the cars on the highway begin to thin out. By now your flying over a desolate desert and have passed into the neighbouring state.

You slow down and dive. The broom takes you down a bit too quickly and your landing is much rougher than you would like, but your massive oversized ass cushions any damage that would be sustained.
"Well that was fun" you giggle, resting a hand on your heaving chest "Defiantly got to do that again!". The broom is safely stashed in a rocky crevasse and you set a magical beacon above to mark its place.

You set off, marching briskly. A quick spell turns you eyes into pools of smoking purple fire; while also giving you the ability to temporarily sense tracks and nearby animals. The world looks a weird shade of purple, but you head off following several rabbit tracks. Its pretty easily and you happily hum a pop song as you waddle along. However your enhanced vision picks up strange burns and stains in the dirt. it follows a goat trail which in turn leads to a rather horrific scene. Corpses of goats with flesh scorched by acid and a fire that stinks of sulphur. You look away before you throw up but realise that the trail has ended at the massacre. However two possible locations present themselves: a dried up creek and a outcropping of rocky hills.
111312111112221112211122121121211221111.title: Next ingrediant: Basilisk guts

1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
Heading down the creekbed, you find that its very dusty. The long dried up mud crunches under your boots and creates miniature dust storms as you waddle through. Long dead trees hang over the banks while the floor is littered with smooth stones and fish bones. Your enhanced vision picks up a few droplets of acid and you can easily smell a strong pong of sulphur.
"Well at least we are on the right track" you mumble, peering round a bend in the river. Goat and rabbit bones litter the floor long with a few that look very suspiciously human. Shuddering as you do, you gently tiptoe around the bones.

The feeling of gas suddenly hits you. swearing under your breath your clutch your flabby belly. Your guts churn loudly as the foul gas builds up by your pucker, begging to be released.
"Not now!" you whine, face growing pale with effort of holding it in. "he'll hear me!"

Thankfully the pain suddenly subsides. Letting go of your belly, you gasp with relief and take a step forwards.

FAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTT!

It sounds to you, like the loudest burst of gas to ever escape your rear end. It echoes off the walls of the creak, and fills every nook and cranny. You wince, knowing in must have heard you. Your pessimism is rewarded by a long, deep hiss.

From a rough hole in the creek's wall, emerges a large diamond-shaped head. Its skin is a dry yellow patterned with venomous black stripes and patterns. A frill of curved black horns frame its head and when it opens its jaws you can see the lines of curving teeth and vile yellow tongue.

"Hello?" you ask weakly as it studies you with glittering red eyes. it hisses again, foul-smelling blue fire bubbling from its lips. The monster snake slithers from its den, armoured scales glittering in the moonlight. It its full length its is more than nine meters and was thicker than a medium sized tree. White acid droplets dripped from its pores and a nasty collection of spines flicked on the end of its tail.

"He looks hungry..." you gulp as the basilisk slithers towards you, towering over while tasting the air with its long forked tongue.

Choose a....
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: Creekbed

1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
As the colossus reptile bared it's fangs at you, you tried to keep your composure under all this pressure. More sweat than usual was appearing all over your face from fear knowing what the basilisk could do.
After breathing a deep sigh, you began to mutter something that was foreign to you but, you somehow knew what you were saying. Within moments, a green aura shot itself from your finger tips and into the air creating a loud bang.
The aura then shot down straight down into your butt which caused loud rumbling to in you belly. It didn't feel painful, but actually rather pleasant. On reflex, you turn body away from the basilisk and with a mighty roar...from your butt:

PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!!!

A wave of the green aura shot out like green flames that encased the basilisk and within seconds, it hit the ground causing a loud thud on impact.

You dust yourself off and inspect the creature to see no sign off life.

"A spell for enhance farts? Must keep a note on that one." You smiled as you collect what you need for the potion.
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: Enhancement spell

1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
After messily pulling the guts from the scorched Basilisk so wrap them up and stuff them in your bag. The poison burns and hisses on your skin but does no harm thanks to the power coursing within you. The inside of the monster smells worse than even your expulsions. After taking a moment to breathe, you pack your bag up and get ready to depart.
As you heading to your broom which you perched on a large boulder, you hear another loud hiss. Whipping around, you watch as a smaller basilisk emerges from the brush, the bushes smoulder and wither. It seems to be a young adult and looks rather angry, the razor spines around its head erecting into a frill.

"Oh dear!" you groan. With a turn on your heels you ran towards your broom, your rolls of blubber wobbling comically like jelly. The monster chases after you, breathing blue sulphur flames at you. You swing your fat leg over the broom and rocket off. The basilisk hisses and screams at you as you shoot into the night sky.

"At least that bits over" you mutter, examining your robe for any acid or fire damage. You release a burst of gas to warm you up before turning in a wide circle and flying westwards.
Its much more lonely flying over the vast empty desert. There are no lights to keep you company apart from a few haulers making the long journey across the highway. You fly on for a few hours, shadowing a large haulage train for the majority. Its rather fun zipping around and lapping the long line of cargo carriages. Soon the scrub gives way to towns and farmland and soon your back over a populated area.

The journey takes you over two states. Finally your start to arrive at a long line of mountains and deep inaccessible valleys. A thick carpet of pines coats the mountain range. After wheeling around over the area, your reduce your brooms speed and ease yourself down into a clearing. As usual you set the broom down by stump and sit your overly large booty down on the carpet of dead needles. You examine the layout of the mountain and conclude that you can either venture down a valley or up one of the rocky mountains.
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: Next up: The Cockatrice

1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
It would have been a hard walk for your former self, let alone the now obese 40-year old you. Its very tough going and your witch robes are soon soaking in sweat. You take a moment to collapse in a gasping heap and take a long break. Once you can breathe properly again, you cast a quick endurance spell which quickly revitalised you, you set off again.

Uphill is very steep and while the trees are spread more thinly, there is still enough foliage to block out most of the night sky. Very few birds coo in the trees and the entire forest is deathly silent aside from the frequent loud blasts from your backside.
After a particularly loud blast, the forest echoes with a birdlike screech. You turn on the spot in shock and peer nervously downwards into the darkness of the woods. There is a few rustles and the flap of leathery wings that sounds too close than you would like it to be.

"Ah" you mumble twiddling your fingers uncomfortably "I'm being hunted"

Twigs snap in reply.
You glance about looking for an exit, but your nearing the peak of the mountain and the cockatrice has cut you off.
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: mountain

1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
You sprint off down the hill, gut wobbling, huge breasts slapping into your stomach. Behind you can hear the scrape of claws and flap of wings. The beast's foul panting can be heard as it barrels down after you.

As you run you franticly think of a speed enchantment. When you remember one, you yell out the incantation with sends you bursting forwards with tremendous speed. You shoot down the slope, legs a blur.
"Yeah!" you laugh as you pace down the slopes. Your revelry is very quickly interrupted when you foot trips over a protruding root and you are sent tumbling down the slope like a fat bowling ball.
After bouncing and rolling painfully down the slope you roll into a bush. You groan as you feel the sore scrapes and bruises all over your body. You ribs are painfully broken and feel on fire but after murmuring a few words they quickly reset and heal.

Slowly you crawl out the bush and unsteadily get back on your feet.

The cockatrice is sitting a few meters in front of you. As tall as you are it boasted the body of a giant rooster with tattered black bat wings and a long twisting snake tail.

The beast screeches displaying the short sharp teeth that lined its beak. Its mouth is bloody from a recent meal.

Do you?
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: Run for it

choices: Cast a spell on the cockatrice
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
You hurriedly mumble a spell and you whole body judders as a bolt of smoky green lightening explodes out your fingers and rockets towards the monster. It hits it in the chest and erupts in a billowing cloud.
The cockatrice steps forward, shaking the crackling green magic away with its monstrous rooster head. The wart-covered wattle dangles from its neck as it studies you with the slitted yellow eyes.

Suddenly it lunges forward, mouth snapping and claws outstretched. You jump backwards, watching as the curved talons miss you by millimetres. You get a view of its underside as it barrels over and you reach out with your plump hands to grab onto its tail. Your fingers slip over the smooth scaly skin before you grasp on and are yanked along behind the monster.

Enraged it speeds down the slope, you swing wildly on the end of the monsters tail, left and right. Everything is a blur as passing branches whip you, its a battle to stop hurling on your roller-coaster ride.
The cockatrice tries several times to get rid of you, smashing its tail deliberately into trees, doing sharp turns to throw you off and waving its serpentine tail like a lunatic

On the end of its tail, you pant and hold on for dear life. You've broken several bones after being smashed into trees and rocks but your magic heals them quickly. You know you have to try and do something before you fall off.
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: cast a spell

choices: Stay holding on to its tail
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
You decide to cast an incantation on the monster. Tightening your grip to avoid being shaken off, your think of an effect and yell out the words that form unbridled in your mind. Your gut rumbles in reply and you feel another gas burst coming on. Grunting you shut your eyes and let the fart erupt.
PPAARRRRPPP!
The gas is a strange yellow hue. After billowing out your backside it collects and flies towards the head of the monster. The magic surrounds its beady eyes, ensuring its vision is a blank field of yellow.
Roaring and screeching at its blindness the beast charges around. It smashes into pines, the branches cutting and stabbing into its skin. Two whole pines trees are felled by its collisions. It attacks thin air and bites huge chunks out the dirt, attacking at random in it anger. Your spell prevents it from seeing anything at all, allowing you to grip its scaled and ridged skin more tightly.

Staggering around blinding, ripping its wings on broken branch ends and cutting its feet on stones, the monster manages to step upon the rotting skeleton of an unfortunate victim. The bones splinter and snap under its weight, a decayed leg bone stabbing right into the yellow scales of its calf. Screaming loudly in pain, it flaps its huge black wings and starts to lift into the air. You yelp as your pulled up into the air- rising above the dense pine forest and dangling like a comical ball of fat at the end of its tail.

The beast appears to be getting higher and higher and you obesity is becoming a hindrance.
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: Cast a spell on the cockatrice

1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
You decide to stay holding on, finding that your massively overweight body an be quite heavy. You quickly stuff an escaping breast back into your robes before wrapping your fat legs around the long scaly tube to keep on.
Your spell means the cockatrice is flying around wildly, diving up and down like a unnatural black bat. Birds fly away en-mass in terror while you can hear herds of boar fleeing in panic when it flies overhead.

Another spell is quickly cast by yourself, a pulse gathers within your body- churning and multiplying within your guts before shooting out your fingers and forming into a pulse of blue energy that slams into the monster's side like a huge fist. Screeching loudly, its turns to glare at you before turning like a spectral aircraft towards the rocky face of the mountain.
A feeling of dread comes over you as you eye up the huge piles of boulders at the feet of the sheer face, You cast another bolt of blue energy- hitting it between its shoulder blades and causing it to dip. It re corrects its flight path, the rocky face drawing nearer.

You choose another spell, this one races down your arm and forms hundreds of thin red tendrils. When the thin tips of the spell hits the cockatrice's leg, its sends a powerful shock through the bone making the monster cry out in pain and anger again.

Smarting from all spells and hexes you've cast upon it, the cockatrice folds up its wings and plummets towards the cliff. You yell out as the rocky surface rushes towards you.

The winged beast pulls up at the last second and you and it rumble onto a rocky cliff ledge.

You groan and slowly get back on your feet. The outcropping is littered with rubble and small bones. The cockatrice is slowly pacing round like a prehistoric dinosaur, holding its wounded leg aloft and glaring at you
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: Stay holding on to its tail

1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
The whole fight has left your bruised, shaken and rather annoyed. Getting up with a determined expression, you let out several bursts of flatulence that cackle with energy.

The cockatrice hisses and snaps, its horned beak slicing through the air. Its tail whips around wildly and its claws spark and scrap on the rough stone.

Your first hex is a burning bolt of dark purple that shoots out from the middle of your chest. Its screams across the outcropping and strikes the monster dead on. Purple flames erupt around its form as it roars and fails. It charges angrily towards you, the purple fire still aflame across its body.
You slide under the snapping beak and fire off a second spell of bright blazing yellow. It blasts into the cockatrice like a shell, going straight through its torso.

Curved talons slice downwards, you mutter a quick spell that quickly transforms your entire flabby arm into solid steel. Blocking the attack easily in a shower of brilliant sparks. This is followed up by driving your steel fist into the beasts side.

Your rapid sequence of attacks has the monster on its last legs. It flaps about with its ruined wings, still defiantly snapping and trying to shear your obese body in half.

You allow the magic to gather in your big belly before letting the green lightening to arc down your arms, off your fingertips and strike the beast dead. Its head his the dirt as it finally dies in a burst of green lightening.

Elated, you collapse, resting on your bulbous ass. The beast's corpse still smokes and you wait for a minute, contemplating your victory.
As you go to get up, a spell strikes you from behind and your vision fades into black.
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: Go on attack

choices: Lie and make up an excuse
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
You awaken, bleary eyed with your head pounding. As your eyes focus, you see the burnt corpse of the cockatrice a few meters away. Its still night and seems to be around ten minutes after you killed the beast. You go to get up, but find that your entire body is wrapped in thick black chains that glow with a green haze. Its impossible to move or get up and when you try to use your magic you find it useless.

"ah, you awake" says a mocking voice. You turn to see another woman striding towards you. She wears a large witches hat and tight bodice and short skirt. She looks much younger than you, around her mid-twenties but an evil gleam in her eye tells you she is far older.
"You must be one of those disgusting old hags from the puny covens down south" she smiles coldly. Her hair is short and a steely grey colour but her perfectly made-up face looks very youthful. Her corset is very low cut-showing of her full,firm chest and silver necklace made up of intertwining snakes.
"It must be awful" she continues "thinking that being fat and smelly makes you look good, or powerful for that matter" she kicks at your discarded bag, not bothering to search the contents "That fat hag Greta was the only one of your kind that had any decent power, but even she was fat and vile"
You notice that black snakes are constantly swarming in and out her clothes, hissing and snapping at one another. A big black mamba pokes out occasionally from under her skirt, baring its long hooked fangs at you.
"So what is a fat, old witch like yourself doing out, alone at night and trying to take on a cockatrice?" she sneers
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: Ishila Slythdaughter

1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
As the question echoed through your mind, you try to think of a way without her know your agenda. Sweat was treacling down your face and the woman was getting bored waiting for a response.

"Well? Why are you here?" She said. You kept calm as you opened you lips...

"Oh, you know? Just a late night trek. I haven't been here before so I thought a little exploring would be fun. And a moment ago, that cockatrice appeared out of no where, so I fought back in self defence." you say while still keeping your composure.

"Oh, really? Interesting. It's pretty impressive that a witch on your caliber could defeat a cockatrice such as that without a scrap." The woman said while circling around you.

"I am a fast learner" You say modestly.

"I don't think I seen you before. Those witches could easily defeat something like that on their own so WHO. ARE. YOU?" She said as she walked up towards your face.

"Well....."
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: Lie and make up an excuse

choices: She casts a spell on you to try and make you talk
she decides to have fun and duel you
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
"Please" you beg "I wanted to see the mountain scenery and go for a walk when it attacked me"
The witch glares at you before crossing over the burnt corpse of the cockatrice. "These are some very powerful spells" she says, examining the burns and scorches across its body. "Something so swamp coven witch could ever dream of"

As she bends over, you hear a little rumble as a quiet fart sneaks out her backside, even hot skinny witches must fart, it seems. You quietly try and struggle against your chains but they have you held tightly in their grasp.

"So if your more powerful than that, what are your?" she asks aloud. Her long spindly fingers withdraw a long black wand from inside her corset and began to twirl it about threateningly.

"I can cast all manner of spells to make you confess" she says, betraying no emotion. "Pain and horror you have never experienced or just turn your fat ugly body into a fat ugly worm to grind under my heel"

You gulp. Sweat is pooling around your armpits and ass.
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: Keep lying

choices: The saliva had magic in it
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
Readying her hand, she closes in on your face while a purple aura surrounds her hand.

"Last chance missy. Who are you?" She said in a calm tone. You try to break free but still no prevail. Feeling completely cornered, you take a deep breath and from your mouth went:

(Sssspuuuuuuhhhh)

You spat directly on her cheek without a moment of hesitation. She kept a composed while she wiped the spit off.

"Very cleaver hag. but, I prefer you didn't cave in so easily. More fun for me" She said as her wicked smile returned.

"Reveal what you know" She chanted as she fired the purple flame directly at you with intense force. You were struggling to keep your lip's shut. You were tossing and turning trying to resist but, it was no use. You thought you were done in until......
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: She casts a spell on you to try and make you talk

choices: The explosion has freed you and you try and run for it or fight back
The chains are intact and now your opponent is angry
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
The spell forces its way through your mind, crushing your feeble mental defences. You can feel your lips shaking as the hex starts to move them. You try and stop them but the curse is forcing you to form words. Its impossible to remain silent.

"I-I-I-I-I'm" you begin.

As you start to confess, the glob of saliva that was smeared over your interrogator's cheek starts to fizz like magnesium. Her eyes are slowly drawn to her cheek as the spit glows brighter and brighter, fizzing with more and more force.

"You fat bitch" snarls the witch.

The glowing blob of spittle suddenly explodes in a flash of brilliant white light. Rocks fall from the cliff side to shatter apart violently on the ground below. The witch is thrown backwards by the force, which nearly blows the cockatrice carcass off the cliff, failing to do so by only a few feet.
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.title: The saliva had magic in it

choices: The witch goes snooping around to find you
The witch gives up looking for you
1113121111122211122111221211212112211111.content:
In the midst of the dust, you realize you are no longer ensnared by the witch's spell and as a bonus, the blast has seemed to have shatter the chains that once confined you. The witch is still blinded by the explosion. Not thinking about it, you quickly dash towards the cockatrice carcass collect what you need for the potion.
As you run towards your bag and stuff the samples in, you are seeing the dust is starting to diminish. You raise a hand and chant "edih ni nialp thgis" and in an instance, you vanish. You rush over to a large boulder from the rock slide and lay low as the dust has finally settled.

The witch opens her eyes and to her fury, see you are no where in sight.

"Curse that bitch! How could someone with that frame manage to slip past?" She turns to see the broken up chains that are just laying there in the wind.

"She no ordinary witch. It's like Greta's come back or something." She said "But, regardless. She couldn't have gotten far....."

You tip-toe over to the pile of herbs on the table and grab a few stems of nightshade, your potion is now ready to be brewed.

From the blackness emerges a tunnel, roughly dug from the swamp earth, with tangles of roots and spiderwebs hanging from the ceiling. Intrigued, you pick up your ingredients and enter the tunnel.

Its been unused for a long while, maybe hundreds of years. Water drips onto your shoulders and hair. You carry on for around ten meters as the tunnel continues downwards. you can dimly see old buckets and pickaxes lying on the muddy floor

Brushing aside the tangled roots, you emerge into an open area. With you now greatly-diminished powers, you alight a candle that you can just barely see.

The golden light illuminates the whole room. Its very old. Dust seems to coat the book-filled shelves in inches thick layers. Tools are scattered around you feet, old brushes, buckets, boxes and sacks. On every wall is either a bookcase or a shelf filled with bones of strange creatures and monsters, the largest being a fanged lower jaw as long as your fat hips are wide.. A table is set up to one side, covered in empty potion glasses and shriveled up ingredients. In the center however, is a strange sculpture. Its of a woman, in very late childbearing age, around 40 or 50. Her face beams in a smile as she caresses a huge stone pregnant belly. The size of her stomach is big enough for a obese woman like yourself to curl up inside. The very top of her belly is missing, revealing the belly to be hollow. On closer inspection you realize the sculpture is one big cauldron.

"This place must have belonged to Greta!" you gasp in realization.

Brock goes to run out the door when she finds herself frozen. Her body moving against it's will as her shocked expression pull's into the infamous Joy smile.

The boy nod's as tear's run down his face. His pokemon gives a weak. "Ve....no."

===========

hours later.

The boy and his bug type were only the beginning, dozen's of other trainers came and went all day and Brock took care of them all. Employing medical knowledge that Brock never knew before.

She released a breath she didn't know she was holding as she locked the door to the centre for the night and sat down on a nearby couch.

"What a day." Brocked sighed.

"A fine job for your first day." Came a voice like Brock now possessed.

She jumped out of the chair and spun to face the speaker. Across from her was another nurse joy, she looked slightly older than any other he'd ever seen. Fine lines creasing her complexion. She wasn't wearing the standard nurse uniform either. No it looked more like an actual doctor's uniform than a nurse's uniform.

"What the....who are you?!" Brock said. Before catching herself at how stupid that probably sounded.

"Most new Joy make horrible job's the first time round. Your programming must have already taken effect.

"What's going on here!!!" Brock snarled. Sounding anything but threatening with his new 'sweet as honey' voice.

"Oh I apologize. I guess I do look somewhat differant from any other Joy." The older woman coughed slightly before making the same 'welcome' face that Joy's are famous for. "My name is 'Doctor' Joy...."

"Doctor?" Brock said confused.

The woman nodded. "Yes 'Doctor'. And you are my newest daughter."
1512212.title: 'Doctor' Joy

15122121.content:
"Excuse me!?" Brock said in an angry and confused tone. "I am not your daughter lady!"

Doctor Joy gave her an all too familiar smile and sat down on the couch opposite Brocks one.

"You most certainly are my dear. In fact if you had a blood test I'm sure that you'll find that the only parent you'll have is me. No father and most certainly no other family. Just me."

"But, but, but how?! How, why did you do this?!" Brock was on her feet and in the womans face, her hands on the doctors coat.

"Sit. Down. Dear." The older Joy said in a tone not associated with her daughters. Brock once more felt her body move against her will and sit down next to her 'mother', knees together and hands on her lap like a 'ptoper' lady sits.

"Thats better." The doctor said before going into ger explaination. "Now then lets start with the most logical part of your question. Namely the why."

"You see theyre was actually a period many years ago when theyre 'wasn't' a nurse joy at every pokemon centre. No instead you had a whole staff of people of every creed going about the buisness much like a regular hospital. And up until I had established myself as the premiere medical scientist in all the regions, I was also the best pokemon nurse around."

"Ego much." Brock grumbled out past her unopenable jaw.

His 'mother' ignored it. "But alas the rest of my collegues weren't up to my level of ability. I'd be able to treat three pokemon for every one they healed. Needless to say more than a few didn't like me very much."

'Who'd blame them' Brock thought angrily.

"But they were beneath me for the time being. I continued to improve my trade until I was established as the head of the entire pokemon centre organisation and it's top scientist." Said the woiman proudly. "That's when I was able to impliment my grand plan.

Brock through great strain was able to quirk an eyebrow at that statement.

"You see I realised that since I was the best pokemon doctor theyre was that it was a shame to leave 'my' centres in the hands of some incompitent oafs. So I decided one day that. "Every pokemon centre should have a Joy."."

Both of Brocks eyebrows raised at that sentence.

Doctor Joy's smile increased as Brock caught on. "I'm glad to see you understand dear. Clones break down far to quickly to make it worth the time, and I'm a tad squimish with having to constantly supply fresh D.N.A. However genetic modifictations last forever and hypnotism is simple enough to make sure that I have an army of daughters who'll perform just as well as me. Things at my own centre certainly improved when I turned all of my former co-workers into me after all."

All Brock could do was sit theyre. Not so much from shock as the commands her 'mother' issued making it impossible to stand up.

The real doctor Joy however stood up and raised her hand to her mouth to cover up a yawn. "Well it's getting late, I just came by to give you a little introduction into your new life. I suggest you learn to enjoy it sweety because I will never turn you back into that womanising oaf ever again. Buh bye." She started walking towards the doors, opening and closing it as she left.

All Brock could do was sit their seething, unable to move for another 10 minutes until she slumped over in a heap

info.brief_description: You are cursed. What does the curse do? Can you break it? Will you want to?
info.description:
The main chareceter has been cursed. You decide how they were cursed. What it is and how they go about trying to break it if they want to that is. After all not all curses start off unpleasant.

It's up to you. The possibilities are limitless.

However I would like you to follow these fews guideline's. These are not rules but it is prefered if you would follow them to emsure the enjoyment of everyone.

1.2. No scenes of *EXTREME* graphically violent or hardcore sexual nature.
2. No Gay or lesbian content
3. Try to write at 'least' one paragraphs a chapter unless it's not supposed to be a chapter (i.e more choices)
4. When writing in the 'something else' paths please put a chapter before it explaining what your chapter is about and give the option of whether or not the reader wants to follow it ('would you like to follow this story path?' option 1 - yes, option 2 -something else)

Anyone who can make a good actual entry which is at least two paragraphs long I will award an amount of GP based on the quality of the chapter with 100Gp being the minimum Options chapters not included.
